definitions.definition: Carried or used on or in a vehicle or vessel .
Being a part of, being included in, participating in.
examples: When it comes to security, everybody seems to be as onboard as I am.
James is onboard as a production manager.

main_definition: Carried or used on or in a vehicle or vessel .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , figurative ) Being a part of, being included in, participating in.
